subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament
College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Kenny Brown scored 18 points and third-seeded Stanford earned its first N.C.A.A. tournament victory since 2004 on Thursday, routing Cornell, 77-53, in the first round of the South Region in Anaheim, Calif.
snippet: Kenny Brown scored 18 points and third-seeded Stanford earned its first N.C.A.A. tournament victory since 2004 on Thursday, routing Cornell, 77-53, in the first round of the South Region in Anaheim, Calif.
